attributes.action: allow e-petitions to be opposed as well as supported
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently E-petitions only allow support of a petition to be registered. Allowing opposition to also be registered would give a better indication of public feeling on a petition.

rejection.details: This issue is addressed in the FAQs http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
